Title: Those Who Fell
Description:
Since the Day of Shadows these lands have been a dangerous place. 

The kobyss are emboldened, the nerubians probe our lands, creatures of pure shadow have begun to manifest themselves.

The memory of those who have fallen is etched in our everyday lives. We must locate their remains to bring closure. 

Search for the Tinderboxes of these missing expedition members and return them to me.
ObjectivesText: Locate the remains of Oskar Daleclash, Dalian Ironlink and Idona Seerstone, recover their tinderboxes.
PortraitGiverText: A congealed mass of bone and slime, animated by some unknown necromancy.
RewardText: These tinderboxes are but a small symbol of the immense loss we suffered on the Day of Shadows. We will recover the bodies you have located and begin to heal the memories of our loved ones.
